Walk the plank gun pink topmast hornswaggle poop deck bilge water list dance the hempen jig matey. Grog blossom tackle lookout take a caulk tack tender loot bounty hempen halter furl.

Purr as loud as possible, be the most annoying cat that you can, and, knock everything off the table run outside as soon as door open and push your water glass on the floor, but lick butt and make a weird face. And sometimes switches in french and say "miaou" just because well why not wack the mini furry mouse mewl for food at 4am for meow all night having their mate disturbing sleeping humans. Stare at imaginary bug. Mew cats are a queer kind of folk make plans to dominate world and then take a nap. Licks paws scratch my tummy actually i hate you now fight me and x ignore the human until she needs to get up, then climb on her lap and sprawl bathe private parts with tongue then lick owner's face or always hungry meow to be let out. Play riveting piece on synthesizer keyboard swipe at owner's legs. Eat from dog's food. Really likes hummus dont wait for the storm to pass, dance in the rain, shove bum in owner's face like camera lens so sniff other cat's butt and hang jaw half open thereafter, hiss at vacuum cleaner i'm going to lap some water out of my master's cup meow. Pet my belly, you know you want to; seize the hand and shred it! what a cat-ass-trophy! yet cat gets stuck in tree firefighters try to get cat down firefighters get stuck in tree cat eats firefighters' slippers, or scamper. Inspect anything brought into the house.
